title: Random FPS drops and lags
body:
**Hello**,
when I play LOL i usually got about 40 FPS, but sometimes my FPS drop to 01-15 FPS. It doesnt matter if there is huge teamfigt or just peaceful lane phase... And I also got 1-3 lags per game, the game lags for about 1minute (only mouse works, but when I click somewher nothing happends), my chamipion stays on place where I left him, so I usually die :/ Any ideas what to do? thx

replies.body:
I am having the same issue after i updated the patch 6.10. My Ping stays intact but FPS drops drastically from 100+ to 2-10 after every 2-3 minutes and stays like that for 1--2 minutes and this keeps on happening repeatedly, atleast 4-5 times in a normal 25-30 mins game. Literally the game is unplayable for me, i even tried reinstalling but no improvement observed.
Things that i have tried without any results:
-Defragment LOL  folder
-Reinstall LOL client
-Force repair LOL installation files
-Uninstall my antivirus software
-close down all other apps while running LOL

I am at a loss as to what to do next. I even got myself a 5 match low priority queue {{item:3070}} just becoz the game is damn unplayable. I believe this is something to do with the new patch and not my PC or internet as they were working fine few days ago. **I hope someone finds a solution to this problem or riot releases a new patch to sort this out.**

i also tried to delete somethings off my computer and i also reinstalled the game, i tried everything i could, i use to get 150fps and stay with that all game but from the recent patch every minute i drop frames to 4fps even if i just stand there with nothing on my screen going on. i have rage quit due to dying from this and i just got a recent low priority ban because of it. please fix riot. i know it is not my computer.
im with you man this is bullshit and im sure your pc is also good i thaught i was only one with this problem let me know if you find a solution cause ive tried everything i could think of

There are a number of very weird things going on here it looks like.  First, given that your FPS is only a max of 40 usually, it sounds like your computer is on the low-end and doesn't run league very efficiently. This could be a root cause as to why the FPS drops so low, even though this is definitely not normal. Oddly enough, the Lag spikes that cause you not to be able to play for a minute seem to be unrelated to this at all.

In an effort to solve one problem at a time, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684).  The steps in this article are the most common solutions that should help to stabilize and hopefully improve your FPS.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
